name: Espresso
info: A small, strong coffee made by forcing steam through finely ground coffee beans.

name: Latte
info: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Cappuccino
info: A coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and a layer of frothed milk.

name: Mocha
info: A coffee drink made with espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk.

name: Americano
info: A coffee drink made with espresso and hot water.

name: Green Tea
info: A tea made from unfermented leaves.

name: Black Tea
info: A tea made from fermented leaves.

name: Chai Tea
info: A tea made from black tea and a blend of spices.

name: Earl Grey Tea
info: A tea made from black tea and bergamot orange.

name: Matcha Latte
info: A latte made with matcha powder and steamed milk.
